SELECT DISTINCT G.id AS gacha_id , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.view_count , G.created_at , G.updated_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id WHERE 1=1
AND ( G.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR G.manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM GACHA_ITEM GI WHERE GI.gacha_id = G.id AND GI.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) )
ORDER BY G.created_at ASC
SELECT id AS gachaItemId , name , created_at , updated_at FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
